allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Siemens Process Simulation Tree Viewer

Complete PowerShell-based tree navigation viewer for Siemens Process Simulation Oracle databases.

Features:
- Full hierarchical tree visualization with expand/collapse
- Automatic icon extraction from database BLOBs \(95+ icons\)
- Real-time search functionality
- Multi-project support \(DESIGN1-5 schemas\)
- Custom node ordering matching Siemens application
- Interactive HTML output with embedded icons
- Secure password prompting \(no hardcoded credentials\)

Project structure:
- Organized PowerShell scripts \(main/utilities/database\)
- Categorized SQL queries \(icon-extraction/tree-navigation/analysis\)
- Comprehensive documentation
- Configuration templates
- Automated Oracle client setup

Documentation includes:
- Quick start guide
- Oracle setup instructions
- Database structure reference
- Investigation notes and technical discoveries

Security:
- All passwords must be provided at runtime
- No credentials stored in code or configuration files
- Database connection details templated

Ready for immediate use with proper Oracle database access.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Import-Module .\\src\\powershell\\utilities\\CredentialManager.ps1 -Force; $connStr = Get-DbConnectionString -TNSName ''DB01'' -AsSysDBA; $env:NLS_LANG = ''AMERICAN_AMERICA.UTF8''; sqlplus -S $connStr ''@verify-parent-relationship-fixed.sql'' | Out-File ''parent-verification-final.txt'' -Encoding UTF8; Get-Content ''parent-verification-final.txt''")

Bash(./src/powershell/core/run-sql-query.ps1 -TNSName "DES_SIM_DB1_DB01" -Query "SELECT column_name, data_type, data_type_owner, data_length FROM all_tab_columns WHERE owner = ''DESIGN12'' AND table_name = ''COLLECTION_'' AND column_name LIKE ''%CHILDREN%'';")

Bash(for file in PHASE*-TEST-PLAN.md TEST-PLAN.md TESTING.md UAT-PLAN.md E2E-TESTING-STRATEGY.md SEARCH-TEST-PLAN.md TEST-EXECUTION-GUIDE.md README-TESTING.md SMOKE-TEST-RESULTS.md QUICK-SMOKE-TEST.md PRE-FLIGHT-CHECK.md)
Bash(for file in DELIVERABLES.md DATABASE-SCHEMA.md SPECIALIZED-NODES-GUIDE.md QUICK-START-GUIDE.md QUICK-VALIDATION-TEST.ps1 STATUS.md PERFORMANCE.md)
Bash(for file in analyze-study-*.ps1 cache-status.ps1 run-analyze-*.ps1 run-test-*.ps1 run-tool-query.ps1 run-verify-*.ps1 RUN-COVERAGE-CHECK.ps1 validate-against-*.ps1 verify-*.ps1)
